title: Assassination of Olof Palme
summary: On Friday, 28 February 1986, at 23:21 CET (22:21 UTC), Olof Palme, Prime Minister of Sweden, was fatally wounded by a single gunshot while walking home from a cinema with his wife Lisbeth Palme on the central Stockholm street Sveav√§gen. Lisbeth Palme was slightly wounded by a second shot. The couple did not have bodyguards with them.
